scene_description: walking along a set of rusted, abandoned railway tracks that disappear into a foggy forest. Character 1 is balancing on the rail with a flashlight, while Character 2 looks at a map near the wooden sleepers.
lighting_mood: illuminated by the pale blue light of a full moon and the sharp yellow beam of the flashlight cutting through the mist

scene_description: inside a wooden treehouse filled with comic books and radio equipment. Character 1 is looking out the window with binoculars, and Character 2 is tuning a ham radio device.
lighting_mood: lit by the warm, cozy glow of a kerosene lantern hanging from the ceiling, creating deep shadows in the corners

scene_description: in the long hallway of a high school at night, lined with metal lockers. Papers are scattered on the floor. Character 1 is trying to open a locker, while Character 2 stands guard looking down the hall.
lighting_mood: bathed in the eerie, flickering fluorescent light from a single working overhead bulb, casting long, harsh shadows

scene_description: standing at the edge of a dense, tall cornfield. The stalks are towering over them. Character 1 is pushing aside the corn leaves to enter, and Character 2 holds up their calculator to check for signals.
lighting_mood: dominated by deep night blues, with the characters rim-lit by the headlights of a distant car passing on the road

scene_description: in a cluttered basement filled with boxes and an old furnace. Character 1 is shining a light on a strange symbol drawn on the wall, while Character 2 looks terrified at a noise coming from the stairs.
lighting_mood: cast in heavy shadow, illuminated only by the orange pilot light of the furnace and the flashlight beam

scene_description: crouched near the opening of a concrete storm drain pipe in a dry riverbed. Graffiti covers the concrete. Character 1 is shouting into the echoey pipe, and Character 2 is recording the sound.
lighting_mood: lit by the fading purple and orange hues of a sunset, with the interior of the pipe falling into pitch black darkness

scene_description: at the base of a massive metal radio tower surrounded by a chain-link fence. High voltage signs are visible. Character 1 is cutting a hole in the fence, while Character 2 keeps a lookout.
lighting_mood: illuminated by the red warning light blinking atop the tower and the cold, desaturated light of a cloudy night sky

scene_description: hiding behind a dumpster outside a sterile-looking government laboratory building. Ventilation fans are spinning on the wall. Character 1 is peeking around the corner, Character 2 is analyzing data on the calculator.
lighting_mood: contrast between the dark shadows of the alley and the harsh, clinical white security floodlights washing over the building

scene_description: on a suburban street corner. Their BMX bikes are lying on the grass. Character 1 is picking up a walkie-talkie from the ground, and Character 2 is pointing towards a house with broken windows.
lighting_mood: lit by the singular, amber glow of a streetlamp overhead, creating a pool of light in the surrounding darkness

scene_description: navigating through a maze of crushed cars and piles of scrap metal. Character 1 is climbing on top of a car hood to get a better view, while Character 2 examines a strange metallic object on the ground.
lighting_mood: mysterious and gloomy, with moonlight reflecting off the chrome and glass of the wrecked cars

scene_description: in a dusty attic full of cobwebs and old furniture covered in white sheets. Character 1 is opening an old trunk, and Character 2 is holding the calculator up to a dusty circular window.
lighting_mood: dramatic beams of blue moonlight streaming through the window slats, cutting through the floating dust particles

scene_description: in a forest clearing where the ground looks scorched and strange vines are growing. Character 1 is kneeling to touch the ground, and Character 2 is backing away slowly.
lighting_mood: eerie and supernatural, with a faint, unexplainable green bioluminescent glow coming from the strange vines

scene_description: sitting in a booth inside a retro diner, looking out the window at something scary outside. A jukebox is in the background. Character 1 presses hands against the glass, Character 2 looks at the menu nervously.
lighting_mood: illuminated by the colorful neon signs of the diner interior reflecting against the dark, rainy window glass

scene_description: standing in the middle of an old wooden covered bridge. Character 1 is shining the flashlight into the rafters, and Character 2 is looking down through a gap in the floorboards at the water below.
lighting_mood: very dark and claustrophobic, with the only light sources being the flashlight and the faint reflection of the water below

scene_description: sitting on a bench at a lonely bus stop on a deserted road. Character 1 is checking a watch impatiently, and Character 2 is looking down the empty road with binoculars.
lighting_mood: misty and noir-like, lit by a flickering overhead light that buzzes, casting intermittent shadows

scene_description: standing at the edge of an empty, cracked swimming pool filled with fallen leaves. Character 1 is climbing down the rusty ladder, while Character 2 examines strange markings on the pool's edge.
lighting_mood: bathed in the golden hour sunset light, casting long dramatic shadows across the pool's interior, with orange and purple hues

scene_description: between towering bookshelves in a dimly lit library after closing time. Character 1 is pulling an old book from a high shelf, while Character 2 holds a flashlight and watches the door nervously.
lighting_mood: illuminated by scattered reading lamps creating pools of warm light, with dark corridors between the shelves creating a maze-like atmosphere
